title: Log full with messages about YUV_420_BIPLANAR, usage=SCANOUT_CPU_READ_WRITE, buffer and mailbox
body:
I see many times per second this message in the logs:

```
Nov 21 09:30:35 nyx com.github.IsmaelMartinez.teams_for_linux.desktop[2263981]: [55:1121/093035.193767:ERROR:gbm_pixmap_wayland.cc(82)] Cannot create bo with format= YUV_420_BIPLANAR and usage=SCANOUT_CPU_READ_WRITE
Nov 21 09:30:35 nyx com.github.IsmaelMartinez.teams_for_linux.desktop[2263981]: [55:1121/093035.193979:ERROR:gpu_channel.cc(503)] Buffer Handle is null.
Nov 21 09:30:35 nyx com.github.IsmaelMartinez.teams_for_linux.desktop[2264060]: [132:1121/093035.194231:ERROR:shared_image_interface_proxy.cc(134)] Buffer handle is null. Not creating a mailbox from it.
```

One time I saw this (maybe this is related):
```
Nov 21 09:30:35 nyx com.github.IsmaelMartinez.teams_for_linux.desktop[2264060]: [132:1121/093035.288736:ERROR:sdp_offer_answer.cc(424)] A BUNDLE group contains a codec collision for payload_type='101. All codecs must share the same type, encoding name, clock rate and parameters. (INVALID_PARAMETER)
```

I use Fedora 41, GNOME Wayland.
```
Portal for Teams	com.github.IsmaelMartinez.teams_for_linux	1.11.5	stable	flathub	system
```
